text: Bernard Malanda-Adje (28 August 1994 â€“ 10 January 2015), nicknamed Junior Malanda, was a Belgian professional footballer. He played as a defensive midfielder for VfL Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga. He was born in Brussels, Belgium. Malanda died in a car accident in Porta Westfalica, North Rhine- Westphalia, Germany at the age of 20. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belgian footballers Category:Road accident deaths Category:Sportspeople from Brussels
title: Junior Malanda
